content: I have recently changed my kerb. It was deadpool, then I noticed my mistake and switched to langer1. I can no longer access my grades before this point. Is there a way that you (or even myself) can import my grades over? I am sorry for this unneeded difficulty.
subject: Kerb Error

content: Can you continue submitting under deadpool or does that kerb not work anymore at all?

Ok, I can change the quiz scores over to your langer1 account. But you'll have to resubmit the finger exercises 1-7 and re-upload your pset 1-2 files. I gave you an extension until tomorrow at 3pm to do so. You should submit pset3 under your langer1 account.
Thank you for your help! It is very much appreciated!
Is it possible to also move over the checkoffs for PSET1 and PSET2
